text: The Bachelor's Lauren Bushnell split with beau Devin Antin after a year of dating. The 28 - year - old reality star began dating Devin in July of 2017, two months after ending her relationship with fiance Ben Higgins, whom she met on season 20 of The Bachelor. Lauren and Devin met on Tinder and struck up a friendship before she competed on the ABC reality dating game show. Splits : The Bachelor's Lauren Bushnell split with beau Devin Antin after a year of dating ; ( pictured March )'I don ’ t think I ’ ve shared before but I only met up with one person from the app and it was him,'the beauty wrote during an Instagram Q & A with fans in October 2017.'We hung out for a while but more as friends but always got along
